## AudioEventPayloads."AUDIO.SET\_REFERENCE\_DISTANCE" property

Emitted when the audio's reference distance is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[AudioEvent.SET_REFERENCE_DISTANCE]: {
        audio: Audio;
        referenceDistance: number;
    };
```
